common.cooldownMessage: `{name}` is on cooldown for {time} more seconds.
common.errorMessage: There was an error while executing that command.
common.noBotToken: There is not a DISCORD_TOKEN in the .env file or it is incorrect. Please try again!

language.description: Change the language that Emily uses in your server.
language.response: The language for this server has been set to `{lang}`.

pat.option1: The user you want to give a pat to.
pat.userNotExist: <@{victim}> doesn't appear to be in the server, or another error occurred.
pat.cantpatBot: Ahh! You can't pat me! D:
pat.cantpatYourself: Aww... I think <@{executor}> needs some pats...

ping.description: Pong! Test Emily's response time and make sure she's online.

uptime.description: See how long Emily has been online.
